faqs.question: How long do refunds take?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed within 10 business days to your original payment method. You will receive an email confirmation once the refund has been initiated.

faqs.question: What are shipping times?
faqs.answer:
We offer two shipping options:
- Standard shipping: 5-7 business days
- Express shipping: 2-3 business days

All orders are processed within 24 hours of purchase.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier's website.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer:
To reset your password:
1. Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page
2. Enter your email address
3. Check your email for a reset link
4. Follow the link and create a new password

If you don't receive the email within 5 minutes, check your spam folder.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer:
We offer a 30-day return policy on most items. Products must be in original condition with tags attached. To initiate a return:
1. Contact our support team
2. Receive a return authorization number
3. Ship the item back with the authorization number

Refunds are processed within 10 business days of receiving the returned item.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer:
You can reach our customer support team:
- Email: support@yourcompany.com
- Phone: 1-800-555-0123 (Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm EST)
- Live chat: Available on our website during business hours

We typically respond to emails within 24 hours.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
faqs.answer:
Yes! We regularly offer promotions:
- Sign up for our newsletter to receive a 10% off welcome code
- Follow us on social media for flash sales
- Check our website's promotions page for current offers

Promotions cannot be combined unless explicitly stated.

faqs.question: What browsers are supported?
faqs.answer:
Our website supports the latest versions of:
- Google Chrome
- Mozilla Firefox
- Safari
- Microsoft Edge

For the best experience, we recommend keeping your browser up to date.
